sentences.en: But now he never felt guilty about being untrue to them.
sentences.cn: 但是目前他对她们不忠,他却一点儿不感到内疚.

sentences.en: He exclaimed that it was untrue.
He was adamant that the allegations were untrue, so I took him on trust.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为那些指控不属实，因此我也完全相信他。

sentences.en: I put this to Kenyon. "Absolutely untrue," he said.
sentences.cn: 我向凯尼恩指出了这一点。他说：“绝对不是真的。”

sentences.en: It was not quite so untrue as might have been expected.
sentences.cn: 它并不象人们所料想的那样完全不合标准.

sentences.en: It’s untrue to say that the situation has not changed.
sentences.cn: 说情况没有改变，这是没有根据的。

sentences.en: Most of those reports were a nightmare - grotesque, circumstantial , eager, and untrue.
sentences.cn: 那些报道大多数都是一场噩梦 ― ―离奇古怪, 捕风捉影, 煞有介事, 而且不真实.

sentences.en: Scurrilous and untrue stories were being invented.
sentences.cn: 有人正在捏造虚假诽谤的故事。

sentences.en: Shall we wake up suddenly and find it untrue?
sentences.cn: 我们会不会突然醒来,发现只是一场梦?

sentences.en: Such remarks are both offensive and untrue.
sentences.cn: 这种言论既令人恼火又不属实。

sentences.en: The story was fabricated and completely untrue.
sentences.cn: 这个故事是编出来的,一点都不真实.

sentences.en: This , it later transpired, was untrue.

trans.tran_cn: 不真实的，不合标准的，不忠实的，非真
trans.tran_en: not based on facts that are correct
